item.description:
FEBRUARY 1-2 – SUSTAINABLE LIVING PRESENTATION in NEW LONDON
A “Sustainable Living” presentation will take place in New London at Colby Sawyer College on Friday Feb 1, 2013 (6:30 – 8:30 PM) at the Curtis L. Ivey Science Center (rm 201) with a working lunch scheduled for Saturday, Feb 2 (11:00 – 2:00 PM) at the same location. As we have come to learn, “Sustainable Living” is code for loss of property rights, local control and state sovereignty, all by unelected officials. You have a responsibility to show up and expose the truth about this program for what it really is.
More info at: http://kearsargetransition.wordpress.com/

Here is the map, the science center is #9
http://www.colby-sawyer.edu/assets/pdf/csc-campus-map.pdf
item.name: Sustainable Living Presentation
